title: Taylor Swift Matched These $15 Tights to Her Signature Red Lip - Because of Course
description: Taylor Swift's presence at NFL games has done more than just bring a new legion of fans to the sport; it's also given fashion girlies (like myself) an excuse to tune in each week for a glimpse at the star's commanding game-day looks. Last weekend, Swift attended the 2025 AFC Championship game between the Kansas City Chiefs and Buffalo Bills, decked out in a head-to-toe Louis Vuitton ensemble that offered a grunge, Blair Waldorf-inspired take on TikTok's loud-luxury trend - perhaps a callback to the Y2K aesthetic she sported throughout her original "Reputation" era? (Cue the speculation of Swifties everywhere.) Keeping in theme with the red and black color palette of her boyfriend, Travis Kelce's, Super Bowl-bound team, the pop star paired a logo Louis Vuitton hoodie and beanie with a preppy mini skirt, lace-up boots, and burgundy Calzedonia 50 Denier Total Comfort Soft Touch Tights ($15) - which perfectly matched Swift's red lips (because of course). The pop star-approved opaque tights are made from a polyamide material that's thick, without being too warm - making them a great wardrobe essential to have on hand year-round, but especially come winter. And with over 10 different colorways to shop - 3897 Dark Red being Swift's shade of choice - you can easily mix the colorful tights into your game-day wardrobe or Super Bowl outfit, regardless of the team you're rooting for. While the under-$20 accessory is one of the more affordable options in the musician's most recent game-day outfit, Swift has incorporated plenty of budget-friendly pieces into her past WAG looks - including a $35 knit beanie and custom New Balance sneakers. Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Yes, you need these in your wardrobe.

html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Taylor Swift's presence at NFL games has done more than just bring a new legion of fans to the sport; it's also given fashion girlies (like myself) an excuse to tune in each week for a glimpse at the star's commanding game-day looks.

Last weekend, Swift attended the 2025 AFC Championship game between the Kansas City Chiefs and Buffalo Bills, decked out in a head-to-toe Louis Vuitton ensemble that offered a grunge, Blair Waldorf-inspired take on TikTok's loud-luxury trend — perhaps a callback to the Y2K aesthetic she sported throughout her original "Reputation" era? (Cue the speculation of Swifties everywhere.)

Keeping in theme with the red and black color palette of her boyfriend, Travis Kelce's, Super Bowl-bound team, the pop star paired a logo Louis Vuitton hoodie and beanie with a preppy mini skirt, lace-up boots, and burgundy Calzedonia 50 Denier Total Comfort Soft Touch Tights ($15) — which perfectly matched Swift's red lips (because of course).

The pop star-approved opaque tights are made from a polyamide material that's thick, without being too warm — making them a great wardrobe essential to have on hand year-round, but especially come winter. And with over 10 different colorways to shop — 3897 Dark Red being Swift's shade of choice — you can easily mix the colorful tights into your game-day wardrobe or Super Bowl outfit, regardless of the team you're rooting for.

While the under-$20 accessory is one of the more affordable options in the musician's most recent game-day outfit, Swift has incorporated plenty of budget-friendly pieces into her past WAG looks — including a $35 knit beanie and custom New Balance sneakers.

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.
